name: Battlechoc
description:
Battlechoc

Battlechoc is a turn-based strategy game, inspired by battleships but with an additional build phase. Battlechoc is a game where you need all your creativity and strategic skills to compete successfully against other players and become the next Battlechoc Grand Master.

Build Phase

After placing your chocolate factory in the initial turn, it's up to you to choose between different building types. Just to list a few:

  • The Cacao Tree increases the amount of cacao generated for you in each game round. Cacao is the only resource in Battlechoc. You pay new buildings with cacao.
  • The Rum Truffle Cannon is the primary attack vessel in the game. It can be upgraded to a Fruit Cannon. Each cannon results in an additional attack on a single cell within the gamefield of your opponent during the attack phase of the game.
  • The chocolate fountain acts as a shield and is able to mitigate a certain amount of your enemie's attacks. The fountain is more vulnerable to fruit cannon attacks than to those of the rum truffle cannon.
  • You can also place trap buildings like Donuts and the X-Mas Factory to mitigate other types of attacks like the Easter Bunny spying attack.
Attack Phase

Attack your enemy with rum truffle and fruit cannons, melt down parts of your opponent's gamefield or choose to reveal your enemies secrets with the easter bunny.

Choclab

Upgrade your units to withstand enemy attacks, increase their attack powers, generate more cacao on each turn or unlock new donut traps.

Multiplayer Features

Besides playing against the AI you can choose to play against one of your friends or random opponents.

Collect coins to unlock new attacks and building types as you progress in the game, challenge your friends and climb the Battlechoc ladder to become the Battlechoc Grand Master.
